info.title: Blaaize Wallet API
info.description: This is the API documentation for Blaaize Wallet.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all users, filterable by name, email, and creation date.
Retrieve a user's profile including their wallets and recent transactions.

post.description: Transfers funds from one user's wallet to another, converting currency if needed.

200.description: Request accepted and money transferred successfully

message.example: Money request accepted successfully. Funds have been transferred.

post.description: Creates a wallet for the authenticated user with the specified currency.

400.description: Invalid currency or wallet already exists

message.example: Invalid currency or wallet already exists.

get.description: Fetches a paginated list of wallets for the authenticated user.
Fetches details of a specific wallet belonging to the authenticated user.

parameters.name: walletId
parameters.description: ID of the wallet to retrieve
